00009 #pragma once
00010 #ifndef __X2D_VIEWPORT_H__
00011 #define __X2D_VIEWPORT_H__
00012 
00013 #include "math_util.h"
00014 #include "log.h"
00015 #include "graphics_engine.h"
00016 #include "camera.h"
00017 #include "color_info.h"
00018 
00019 namespace x2d {
00020 namespace base {
00021         
00025     class viewport
00026     {        
00027     public:
00032         viewport(const rect& b, const boost::shared_ptr<camera>& cam, 
00033                  const color_info& bg_col=color_info(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f))
00034         : box_(b)
00035         , camera_(cam)
00036         , bg_color_(bg_col)
00037         {            
00038             LOG("Creating viewport (%f %f %f %f)", 
00039                 box_.origin.x, box_.origin.y,
00040                 box_.size.width, box_.size.height);
00041             
00042             LOG("Done creating viewport...");
00043         }
00044         
00045         ~viewport()
00046         {
00047         }
00048         
00049         boost::shared_ptr<camera> get_camera()
00050         {
00051             return camera_;
00052         }
00053         
00054         rect box() const
00055         {
00056             return box_;
00057         }
00058         
00063         point get_world_location(const point& p) const
00064         {
00065             // translate screen-space pixel size to viewport-space pixel size
00066             float xs = camera_->frustum_.width / box_.size.width;
00067             float ys = camera_->frustum_.height / box_.size.height;
00068             point vp = point(p.x*xs, p.y*ys);
00069             
00070             LOG("Request world location from viewport location: %f %f", vp.x, vp.y);
00071             return camera_->inverted_transformation(vp);
00072         }
00073         
00078         void use()
00079         {               
00080             glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00081             glLoadIdentity();  
00082             
00083 #ifdef ES1_GLEXT_H_GUARD
00084             glOrthof(0, camera_->frustum_.width, 0, camera_->frustum_.height, -1, 100);
00085 #elif defined (_OPENGL_H)
00086             glOrtho(0, camera_.frustum_.width, 0, camera_.frustum_.height, -1, 100);
00087 #endif
00088             glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00089 
00090             // setup our (smaller) viewport and tell opengl we want to cut everything out of view
00091             glViewport(box_.origin.x, box_.origin.y, box_.size.width, box_.size.height);
00092             glScissor(box_.origin.x, box_.origin.y, box_.size.width, box_.size.height);
00093         }
00094 
00098         void clear()
00099         {
00100             // draw bg
00101             glPushMatrix();
00102             glLoadIdentity();
00103             
00104             float width =  camera_->frustum_.width;
00105             float height = camera_->frustum_.height;
00106             
00107             float vertices[] =
00108             {      
00109                 0,     0,    0.0,
00110                 width, 0,    0.0,
00111                 0,     height,     0.0,
00112                 width, height,     0.0
00113             };
00114             
00115             glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00116             glColor4f(bg_color_.r, bg_color_.g, bg_color_.b, bg_color_.a);
00117             glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, 0, vertices);
00118             glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP, 0, 4);
00119             glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);            
00120             glPopMatrix();
00121         }
00122         
00123     private:
00124         rect                        box_;
00125         boost::shared_ptr<camera>   camera_;
00126         color_info                  bg_color_;
00127     };
00128         
00129 } // namespace base
00130 } // namespace x2d
00131 using namespace x2d::base;
00132 
00133 #endif // __X2D_VIEWPORT_H__
